topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Managing Host Systems

body.p: From the Inventory Detail page you can see detailed information about a host, and use it to define hardware profiles that can be used across the cluster.
body.note: This feature applies only to KVM region servers.
body.p: You access the Inventory Detail page by clicking the host name on the Hosts tab of the Systems Inventory page. The inventory detail for a host consists of multiple tabs, each addressing a different aspect of the host.

section.title: Overview
section.p: The Overview tab on the Inventory Detail page summarizes core details about a host object.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Inventory tab.
In the Host Name column, click the name of the locked host to open the Inventory Detail page for that host.

section.p: The following items are included in the summary:

ul.li: host name, personality, and the internal UUID and host ID reference numbers
MAC and IP addresses on the internal management network
serial ID, if known. Use the command system host-modify <hostname> serialid=xxx to update it.
location, as entered by the operator using the Edit Host window. For more information, see Host Memory
time stamps of when the host was created and last updated
board management (iLO) information, if available, including controller type, MAC address, and IP address.
